attributes.action: Make the BBC to stop funding Eurovision Contest waisting money.
attributes.additional_details: Because we get Zero points in n Eurovision
attributes.background: The European Countries do not like the United Kingdom, the BBC are waisting the Tv funding money that could be covering the OAP license fee.

rejection.details: The BBC is an independent body governed by a Royal Charter. Under the terms of that Charter, the BBC is operationally and editorially independent of government and there is no provision for the Government to intervene in the BBC’s day-to-day operations. This includes decisions by the BBC relating to the Eurovision Song Contest.
